select user.id as userId, user.userface, user.cname, tb1.growFlyCnt, tb1.diedFlyCnt, tb1.babyFlyCnt from (select owner, count( case when status=-1 then 1 else null end) diedFlyCnt, count( case when status=0 then 1 else null end) as babyFlyCnt, count( case when status=1 then 1 else null end) as growFlyCnt from flies group by owner) as tb1 left join user on user.id=tb1.owner
order by tb1.growFlyCnt desc
